Subscription.Description: Provides visibility of all PowerShell execution (version 5+)
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational"> <!-- Selects PowerShell 'Script Block Tracing' (4104), PowerShell 5+ --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational">*[System[EventID=4104]]</Select> <Suppress Path="Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational"> <!-- Suppress common system activity --> *[EventData[Data[@Name='ScriptBlockText']='prompt']] or *[EventData[Data[@Name='ScriptBlockText']='$global:?']] </Suppress> </Query> </QueryList>
